title: 崩潰求助
author: ta60207
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Don't be sad. I'll do better next time, I promise!

Description: Updating screen events

replies.author: 时透无一年
replies.txt_content: 估计快照bug，应该是那个诅咒特效出问题吧

replies.author: ta60207
replies.txt_content:
C似水流年 发表于 2016-9-29 18:51
估计快照bug，应该是那个诅咒特效出问题吧
然而我試過1.10.2 1.9 都同一個問題

replies.author: Ant繁星飞跃
replies.txt_content:
老兄 繁体字？   额  
不会是JAVA 或者版本问题吧？
1.8以上需要java8

replies.txt_content:
